forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with heavy rain developing later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Periods of heavy rain likely in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain, heavy at times. Low 14C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: A wind driven heavy rain. Low 58F. Winds S at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Potential for flooding rains. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Potential for flooding rains. High 58F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Potential for flooding rains. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Potential for flooding rains. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
